dojo.name: The Command Center
dojo.description: Training grounds for agentic commanders. Learn to delegate, trust, and oversee.
dojo.entry_ritual: A warrior who does everything themselves is not a commander—they are a soldier.

skills.name: First Command
skills.description: Execute a single shell command through Claude
skills.training: Practice: Have Claude run 'ls -la' and explain the output.
skills.mastery_check: Can you delegate simple commands confidently?

skills.name: Checkpoint Discipline
skills.training: Practice: Develop the habit of checkpointing before any modification.

skills.name: Battle Sequences
skills.description: Allow Claude to execute multiple commands in sequence
skills.training: Practice: Have Claude clone a repo, install deps, run tests—without interruption.

skills.name: Tactical Retreat
skills.description: Use /rewind and git checkout to recover from failures
skills.training: Practice: Intentionally let something fail, then recover.
skills.mastery_check: Do you panic at errors or calmly restore?

skills.name: Mission Briefing
skills.description: Define clear objectives and boundaries for tasks
skills.training: Practice: Write task definitions that are specific enough to succeed but loose enough to allow agent creativity.
skills.mastery_check: Can you brief an agent effectively?

skills.name: Fire and Forget
skills.description: Start tasks and return to completed work
skills.training: Practice: Give Claude a refactoring task, do something else, return to review.
skills.mastery_check: Can you walk away from a running agent?

skills.name: Review Protocol
skills.description: Let agents create PRs, review asynchronously
skills.training: Practice: Have Claude create a PR, review it like a human teammate.

skills.name: Shift Change
skills.training: Practice: End a session, return next day, resume without losing context.
skills.mastery_check: Can you maintain continuity across sessions?

tier_4_general.name: General

skills.name: Army Command
skills.description: Coordinate multiple agents on different tasks
skills.training: Practice: Run parallel agents—one on frontend, one on backend.

skills.name: Night Watch
skills.training: Practice: Start a major refactor before bed, review in morning.
skills.mastery_check: Can you sleep while agents work?

skills.name: Campaign Planning
skills.training: Practice: Plan a week-long migration with daily agent objectives.
skills.mastery_check: Can you think in campaign timescales?

tier_4_general.warning: At this level, you are no longer coding. You are commanding.

training_quests.name: The First Order
training_quests.description: Successfully delegate and complete a task without manual coding
training_quests.objective: Have Claude implement a feature from description to working code

training_quests.name: The Failed Battle
training_quests.description: Intentionally create a mess, then recover
training_quests.objective: Let Claude break something, then restore via checkpoint

training_quests.name: The Night Watch
training_quests.description: Run your first overnight autonomous session
training_quests.objective: Start a 4+ hour autonomous task and review results later
